text: Ezɨ Sol kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, a Devit amadaghtɨ, a mangɨ Filistiaba ko mɨsoghtɨma, me a mɨsueghtɨ an aremegham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a uan ingangarir gumazibav kemeghtɨ, me uamategh mangɨ Devit mɨkɨmam. A kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ kamaghsua, Devit bizir bar vamɨra nan guivim givesɨ na danɨngam. Kɨ kamaghsua, Devit nan apaniba ikarvaghɨva 100plan Filistian mɨdorozir gumazibav sueghtɨ me arɨghiregh. Egh a 100plan gumazir kabar mɨkarzir mogomebar inibar ghoregh, da inigh na bagh izɨ.”
